title: Welcome to my universe!
paragraph: Hi there! I'm AJ. I'm a student studying Computer Science at Stellenbosch Univerity. Because of my studies, I am a proficient programmer, problem solver and have a good grasp of mathematics. Outside of my studies, I sing in my University's choir, and I also work on various personal projects which include programming related projects (like this website!) as well as some more "artsy" things like poetry.
